hero.title: Welcome to My Creative Coding Lab
hero.description: Explore the intersection of mathematics, programming, and art through interactive visualizations, generative algorithms, and computational experiments. Each project is a journey into the beauty of code and creativity.

highlights.title: Fractal Trees
highlights.description: Explore the mesmerizing patterns of recursive tree generation using various fractal algorithms including Hilbert curves and spiral variations.

highlights.title: Reaction-Diffusion
highlights.description: Simulate chemical reactions and pattern formation through reaction-diffusion systems, creating organic and dynamic visual patterns.

highlights.title: Ray Tracing
highlights.description: Implement a physically-based rendering system with ray tracing to create photorealistic 3D visualizations.

about.title: About This Project
paragraphs: This portfolio showcases various creative coding experiments built with modern web technologies. Each project demonstrates different computational techniques, from audio analysis and image processing to complex simulations and mathematical visualizations.
Technologies used include TypeScript, P5.js, Three.js, WebGL, and various mathematical libraries. All projects are interactive and run directly in your browser.
